label: ham
subject: Re: [R] generating a new variable based on results of a by command
body: 42 (return) [ _Mamluc_, plur. _Mamalic_, is defined by Pocock, (Prolegom. ad Abulpharag. p. 7,) and D’Herbelot, (p. 545,) servum emptitium, seu qui pretio numerato in domini possessionem cedit. They frequently occur in the wars of Saladin, (Bohadin, p. 236, &c.;) and it was only the _Bahartie_ Mamalukes that were first introduced into Egypt by his descendants.]
